de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.similarityfunction
Interface NormalizedSimilarityFunction<O,D extends Distance<?>>

Type Parameters:

D - distance type
All Superinterfaces:

All Known Subinterfaces:

All Known Implementing Classes:
FractionalSharedNearestNeighborSimilarityFunction
public interface NormalizedSimilarityFunction<O,D extends Distance<?>>
extends SimilarityFunction<O,D>

Marker interface to signal that the similarity function is normalized to produce values in the range of [0:1].
